 2008-14892008-08-08,  ,  ,  ,  PMO
PrecisAmendment to Order in Council P.C. 2008-31 of January 23, 2008, by changing to October 20, 2008, the day on which the Commission on the Internal Inquiry into the Actions of Canadian Officials in Relation to Abdullah Almalki, Ahman Abou-Elmaati and Muayyed Nureddin has to submit its report.
